definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: Mr. Hunter kept his eyes nailed on the car in front of his.
sentences.chinese: 亨特先生目不转睛地盯着他的前面一辆车子。

sentences.english: And both Tottenham Hotspur and Manchester United have made moves for Huntelaar in the past.
sentences.chinese: 热刺和曼城在过去也求购过亨特拉尔。

sentences.english: Our friends were whirled away in Hunter's sports-car.
sentences.chinese: 亨特的跑车迅速带走了我们的朋友。

sentences.english: Hunter and I came ashore to see what was happening, and found the stockade .
sentences.chinese: 我和亨特上岸想看看发生了什么，却发现了这个寨子。

sentences.english: The Huntley surfaced, signalled her success, and was never heard from again.
sentences.chinese: 亨特利号浮上水面，发出成功信号，但从此再无音信。

sentences.english: Huntelaar instead came on after the first 15 minutes to replace the injured Van Persie.
sentences.chinese: 亨特拉尔第15分钟替换受伤下场的范佩西出场。

sentences.english: The first submarine to ever sink an enemy ship was the Huntley.
sentences.chinese: 亨特利号是史上第一艘炸沉敌舰的潜艇。

sentences.english: Dong's new Hunterston plant would be built next to a nuclear power station.
sentences.chinese: 东能源公司的亨特斯顿电厂就将建造在核电厂旁边。

sentences.english: Klaas-Jan Huntelaar and Mathieu Flamini will not be leaving AC Milan during the winter transfer window.
sentences.chinese: 亨特拉尔和弗拉米尼不会在冬季转会窗离开AC米兰。

sentences.english: Afterward, Edwards admitted that he had an affair with Rielle Hunter.
sentences.chinese: 随后，爱德华兹承认他和亨特有婚外情。

sentences.english: I'll connect you with Mr. Hunter.
sentences.chinese: 我这就给你接亨特先生。

sentences.english: Dr. Hunter studied short-term memory in rats.
sentences.chinese: 亨特研究了大老鼠的短期记忆。

sentences.english: I am particularly happy for Huntelaar, who scored twice.
sentences.chinese: 我特别为亨特拉尔感到高兴，他进了两球。

sentences.english: Phil Brown put a lot of effort into signing Stephen Hunt from Reading.
sentences.chinese: 胡尔城主帅布朗花了很大气力从雷丁签来亨特。

sentences.english: Hunt's Oyster Bar has been serving oysters non-stop since the oil leak started.
sentences.chinese: 从漏油事件起始，亨特牡蛎酒吧的牡蛎买卖从来停过。

definition: becquerel (unit of radioactivity, symbol Bq)/abbr. for 貝克勒爾|贝克勒尔[bei4 ke4 le4 er3]
Burns (name)/Nicholas Burns (1956-), US diplomat, Under-secretary at US State Department from 2005
